scripts.test: abaplint && rm -rf output && abap_transpile && node output/index.js
scripts.petstore: abaplint && rm -rf output && abap_transpile && node index.js https://petstore3.swagger.io/api/v3/openapi.json petstore
scripts.github: abaplint && rm -rf output && abap_transpile && node index.js https://raw.githubusercontent.com/github/rest-api-description/main/descriptions/api.github.com/api.github.com.json github
scripts.integration_test: npm run petstore && rm -rf output_test && abap_transpile ./abap_transpile_test.json && node output_test/index.js
